Model.name: VendingFSM
Model.description: a coupled system for accepting external events and perform state transitions for Vending Machine FSM.

Port.name: ExtEventIn
Port.description: External Event to the FSM

Port.name: OutputZero
Port.description: Output of Zero state

Port.name: OutputOne
Port.description: Output of One state

Port.name: OutputTwo
Port.description: Output of Two state

Port.name: OutputThree
Port.description: Output of Three state

Port.name: OutputFour
Port.description: Output of Four state

Port.name: OutputFive
Port.description: Output of Five state

Port.name: OutputErrorOut
Port.description: Error Output

Model.name: Zero
Model.description: Instance of Moore atomic model to accept event and transition in and give output, transition out and error.

Port.name: EventIn
Port.description: External Event to the state

Port.name: TransitionIn
Port.description: TransitionIn coming from other states to the present state

Port.name: output
Port.description: to give output of the state

Port.name: transition out
Port.description: to give out the next active state in the FSM

Port.name: error out
Port.description: to give any error in the state
